amendment.description: Amendment eliminates the $10,716,000 in funding for the East-West Center and applies the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 248 printed in the Congressional Record to eliminate the East-West Center, and increases Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Canseco amendment (A060) Agreed to by recorded vote: 274 - 155 (Roll no. 77).
